text: Martha Palafox Gutiérrez (23 February 1949 – 17 March 2022) was a Mexican politician. She was a member of the Labor Party. She was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1997 until 2000 and again from 2003 until 2006. Palafox Gutiérrez was born in Huamantla, Mexico. She was a Senator from 2012 until 2018, representing Tlaxcala. Palafox Gutiérrez died on 17 March 2022 in Huamantla at the age of 73.Fallece la política tlaxcalteca Martha Palafox Gutiérrez ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Tlaxcala
title: Martha Palafox Gutiérrez
